name: SCNPhysicsHingeJoint
desc: A physics behavior that connects two bodies and allows them to pivot around each other on a single axis.

items.name: init(bodyA: SCNPhysicsBody, axisA: SCNVector3, anchorA: SCNVector3, bodyB: SCNPhysicsBody, axisB: SCNVector3, anchorB: SCNVector3)
items.desc: Creates a hinge joint connecting two physics bodies.

items.name: init(body: SCNPhysicsBody, axis: SCNVector3, anchor: SCNVector3)
items.desc: Creates a hinge joint that anchors a single physics body in space and lets it rotate around a specific axis.

items.name: var bodyA: SCNPhysicsBody
items.desc: The first physics body connected by the joint.

items.name: var axisA: SCNVector3
items.desc: The axis that the hinge pivots around, relative to the node containing the first body.

items.name: var anchorA: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point at which the hinge connects, relative to the node containing the first body.

items.name: var bodyB: SCNPhysicsBody?
items.desc: The second physics body connected by the joint.

items.name: var axisB: SCNVector3
items.desc: The axis that the hinge pivots around, relative to the node containing the second body.

items.name: var anchorB: SCNVector3
items.desc: The point at which the hinge connects, relative to the node containing the second body.
